jcsp.net

Class Net2OneChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcsp.lang.Guard
      • jcsp.lang.AltingChannelInput
        • jcsp.lang.AltingChannelInputWrapper
          • jcsp.net.NetAltingChannelInput
            • jcsp.net.Net2OneChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelInput, Poisonable, NetChannelInput, Networked
    Deprecated. 
    please use package net2 instead

    class Net2OneChannel
extends NetAltingChannelInput
    A channel for network input (RX). This is a "Net2One" channel, which can only be used by one reader at a time.
    Author:
    Quickstone Technologies Limited

        Creates a channel which receives data on a labelled VCN.
        Parameters:
        label - The label to apply to this channel's VCN.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the label supplied is a null reference.

      • Net2OneChannel

        private Net2OneChannel(AltingChannelInput actualChan,
                       RejectableChannel ch)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a zero-buffered channel reader. The getChannelLocation() method can be called to obtain the location information of the constructed channel.
